udio.title: Creating Playlists
udio.desc: Learn how to create & manage your playlists.
udio.article:
First, let's go to our library to check out our tracks. If we go to Liked songs we can browse the full songs we have created. We can then select all the songs we would like to add to our playlist. Click 'Add to Playlist' to get going. Now we can scroll down on the sidebar & look for our new playlist.

We can click to open it. Now we can change the title, change the order of tracks, add & remove tracks & finally, we can publish it.

Remember, if you add tracks that are unpublished they will appear on the playlist. Enjoy making playlists! Keep on rocking

udio.title: Earn Free Credits
udio.desc: How to provide feedback to earn credits.
udio.article:
Need some extra credits? You can earn them for free by providing feedback. Go to the Create screen & click the help tooltip next to your credits.

Click Earn credits & here you can do an A B test of tracks. Listen to each track & select the one you like the best.

You are rewarded 1 credit per test with a max of 50 credits daily.

medioai.title: Writing Lyrics
medioai.desc: Guide to writing & saving lyrics in MedioAI.
medioai.article: With Medio A.I you can use the Song Studio to write your lyrics. Click the Medio A.I sidebar button to open the lyric editor. Here you can start writing your song. You can select from various premade commands such as Verse, Chorus and more. You can highlight any text to see the character count and syllable count. You can save your song and even send the selected lyrics straight the create screen. You can manage unlimited amount of lyrics with Medio AI.

medioai.title: Create Tag Groups
medioai.desc: How to create & manage tag groups for your songs.
medioai.article: With Medio A.I you can use the Tag Manager for ultimate power! Browse over 14,000 different tags from genres, emotions, time periods and more. You can build your own custom tag group using the search function. Once you have a group, you can give it a name and send it straight to the Create screen. Can it get any easier than that? You can save and manage all your tag groups to create and re-use your own style with the power of Udio.com and the MedioAI browser extension.

medioai.title: Find Rhyming Words
medioai.desc: Tool for finding rhyming words to enhance your lyrics.
medioai.article: With Medio A.I finding the perfect rhyme is super easy. Just go to the Rhyme tab and search for any single word. You will be given a tonne of options. Just click on the one you like to copy to the clipboard. Boom, who knew it could be this easy! Keep on rocking A.I music composers!

medioai.title: Seedbank
medioai.desc: Guide to using the seedbank for track generation.
medioai.article: With Medio A.I you can use the Seed bank to save any seed number you are using. You can even give your seed a cool band name, if you want. This the best way to remember and re-use seeds in Udio. Simple, quick and easy. Just like gardening. Kind of.. heh..

medioai.title: Save Track Covers
medioai.desc: Instructions on saving covers for your tracks.
medioai.article: With Medio A.I you can save all the track covers you generate in Udio. Just generate a cover and click the 'Save Covers' button. Then you can click the MedioAI popup and go to Track Covers, here you can view, download and manage all the track covers you created. Pretty neat, eh? Everything is saved locally. Fun stuff, now go create some awesome cover art!

medioai.title: AI Chat
medioai.desc: Using AI chat to get help & suggestions for your music.
medioai.article: With Medio A.I you can start a chat with your connected AI such as OpenAI or using Open Router. You can start a chat using one of the pre-made questions such as getting your song lyrics reviewed, converting phonetic spelling and more. You can include the lyrics in your chat or not. You can also ask the AI anything you want. For those advanced users, you can even change the system prompts in the settings. That's true power. Now you can talk to the AI without ever leaving Udio, how cool is that? I hope this helps you write the next awesome 'banger' as the internet people say.

medioai.title: AI Song Writer
medioai.desc: Guide to using the AI song writer feature.
medioai.article: With Medio A.I you can use the power of A.I. to write a song in seconds. Just fill out the quick form or use the randomize feature. Add in your title, emotion, theme and even musical tags and your connected LLM will get to work. You can connect Open AI or Open Router to use any kind of LLM to fit your writing style. Once you have the lyrics you can copy them and save them in the Song Studo. You can then send them to the Create screen to start the jams! Keep on rocking, you amazing AI music composer.

medioai.title: Count Credits
medioai.desc: How to get the credit count per track.
medioai.article: With Medio A.I you can count the credits of your tracks. Let's hop over to our library and check out a liked song. We can click the dropdown and view Track History. From this page we can click the Count Credits button. Just wait a moment and boom we have the credits spent to make this track! How fun is that?
